mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product( seq_user_id, product_name, product_cnt, product_price, product_desc, product_img, product_thumbImg, category, sale, discount ) VALUES ( #{seq_user_id}, #{product_name}, #{product_cnt}, #{product_price}, #{product_desc}, #{product_img}, #{product_thumbImg}, #{category}, #{sale}, #{discount} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product WHERE category = #{category} AND sale = 'Y' AND product_cnt != 0 ORDER BY reg_date DESC LIMIT 4
